com.fasterxml.util.membuf
Interface ChunkyMemBuffer

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, MemBuffer
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChunkyBytesMemBuffer, ChunkyBytesMemBufferImpl, ChunkyLongsMemBuffer, ChunkyLongsMemBufferImpl, ChunkyMemBufferBase
public interface ChunkyMemBuffer
extends MemBuffer

Generic type for MemBuffers that store data as chunks: sequences of primitive types with length, so that each read will read exact sequence of values that was appended.

Note that most actual read and append methods are defined in type-specific subtypes (such as ChunkyBytesMemBuffer), since Java does not have a way to define generic primitive types.

Method Summary
 int getEntryCount()
          Method for checking how many entries are buffered in this buffer currently.
 int getNextEntryLength()
          Method that will check size of the next entry, if buffer has entries; returns size in bytes if there is at least one entry, or -1 if buffer is empty.
 int skipNextEntry()
          Method that will skip the next entry from the buffer, if an entry is available, and return length of the skipped entry: if buffer is empty, will return -1
 
Methods inherited from interface com.fasterxml.util.membuf.MemBuffer
clear, close, getMaximumAvailableSpace, getSegmentCount, getTotalPayloadLength, isEmpty, waitUntilNotEmpty, waitUntilNotEmpty
 

Method Detail

getEntryCount

int getEntryCount()
Method for checking how many entries are buffered in this buffer currently.

getNextEntryLength

int getNextEntryLength()
Method that will check size of the next entry, if buffer has entries; returns size in bytes if there is at least one entry, or -1 if buffer is empty. Note that this method does not remove the entry and can be called multiple times, that is, it is fully idempotent.

skipNextEntry

int skipNextEntry()
Method that will skip the next entry from the buffer, if an entry is available, and return length of the skipped entry: if buffer is empty, will return -1

Returns:
Length of skipped entry, if buffer was not empty; -1 if buffer was empty
